articles.title: Memorandum on "Northern Limit Line" distributed
articles.content:
Memorandum on "Northern Limit Line" distributed 
     Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The August 24  memorandum of the Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army on the  unreasonableness of the "Northern Limit Line" was distributed as an official document S/1999/925 of the UN Security Council on August 27.
